Mahantaraduka

Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
9.
2339Sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  sārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2340Anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Yāva asaññasattā.) (1)
2341Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (1)
